transcript.text: Today I am the Ghost of Christmas Past
I hope you'll like it
I use this flash palette from MUFE to do my base
I apply the grey shade all over my face with a beauty blender
I use a white flash color to do the highlight points
Once I'm done with the base work I set everything with a lose powder
Put a lot because it's very greasy
I intensify the light points with some white shadow
I put some on my brow bone too, it will help me to blend
I add some on my lids too
I apply white core crayon from Linda Hallberg on my waterline
I put some on my lower lash line too
I set it with some white shadow
I use this shade of the 35K palette from Morphe
to start doing my eyes
I start with the lower lash line beside the white shape
I use my 231 beloved brush from Zoeva
and then I do my crease with the same shade and brush
To illuminate my inner corner I use silver flash color
I put some silver glitters on top
I use this metallic eyeliner from Nabla
it's a part of their Holidays Collection
The shade is gorgeous and very metallic
I will do my brows with a grey liquid lipstick from Lime Crime
and I do them as usual
I just modify the head to give  a sad looking effect
I apply D134 lashes from Eldora
the comes with some silver glitters on them
I intensify my shadow work with some black shadow
So I put some on my lower lash line and crease
I take the grey shade again to do some contouring on my face
I start with my nose and then I add some shapes over my face
to give me a ghost looking
I intensify with some black shadow here and there
I contrats and create volume with a white shadow
I highlight some areas with the silver flash color
I use Acrux flash crayon from linda hallberg all over my lips
and then add some silver glitters on top
I shade my dark circles a bit with the grey shadow
I do my neck with an aqua color
I will do some 3D tears with volume creator from MUFE
I directly mixed the glitters in my volume creator
it creates a 3D gel and then I use the back of a brush
and start from the bottom to create the tear shape
